instructions: Participants produced subjective sampling distributions for three sample sizes (N = 10, 100, 1000) across three different populations. They were asked to assign percentages to categories such that they add up to 100%.

items.question: Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. On what percentage of days will the number of boys among N babies be as follows: [Categories provided based on N]. [Sample Size N = 10]
Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. On what percentage of days will the number of boys among N babies be as follows: [Categories provided based on N]. [Sample Size N = 100]

Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. On what percentage of days will the number of boys among N babies be as follows: [Categories provided based on N]. [Sample Size N = 1000]

Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. 80% of all newborns have a heartbeat of type alpha and the remaining 20% have a heartbeat of type beta. For each sample size, produce a sampling distribution for the number of babies born every day with heartbeat of type alpha. [Sample Size N = 10]

Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. 80% of all newborns have a heartbeat of type alpha and the remaining 20% have a heartbeat of type beta. For each sample size, produce a sampling distribution for the number of babies born every day with heartbeat of type alpha. [Sample Size N = 100]

Approximately N babies are born every day in a certain region. 80% of all newborns have a heartbeat of type alpha and the remaining 20% have a heartbeat of type beta. For each sample size, produce a sampling distribution for the number of babies born every day with heartbeat of type alpha. [Sample Size N = 1000]

A regional induction center records the average height of the N men who are examined every day. The average height of the male population lies between 170-175 cm. Frequency of heights decreases with distance from the mean. Produce a sampling distribution of average height in seven categories: up to 160, 160-165, 165-170, 170-175, 175-180, 180-185, more than 185. [Sample Size N = 10]

A regional induction center records the average height of the N men who are examined every day. The average height of the male population lies between 170-175 cm. Frequency of heights decreases with distance from the mean. Produce a sampling distribution of average height in seven categories: up to 160, 160-165, 165-170, 170-175, 175-180, 180-185, more than 185. [Sample Size N = 100]

A regional induction center records the average height of the N men who are examined every day. The average height of the male population lies between 170-175 cm. Frequency of heights decreases with distance from the mean. Produce a sampling distribution of average height in seven categories: up to 160, 160-165, 165-170, 170-175, 175-180, 180-185, more than 185. [Sample Size N = 1000]
